attributes.additional_details:
Pro-suicide websites, and websites which claim to be pro-choice to cover up the fact that a majority of the users are pro-suicide should be banned.

A large number of people who use these websites are simply there to encourage other people to take their lives and push them away from seeking real help. These sick people can be stopped by hitting the problem at the source, by removing and banning all offending websites.

Many people stumble upon them, to find advice on how to do it, and people who are more than happy to tell someone they've never met to kill themselves, rather than seek help from people who really care about them and want to help them.
